about.bio: I'm 19 years old and a Systems Analysis and Development student, with experience in Full Stack projects. I'm currently focused on NestJS and TypeScript, with an interest in backend, and starting my studies in C# and .NET. I also have experience with Figma, working from prototyping to solution implementation.

principal.desc: Full stack development focused on modern web applications, REST API creation, authentication and relational database integration.

frontend.desc: Building responsive and accessible interfaces, applying best practices in componentization, styling and user experience.

backend.desc: API structuring, business rules and data modeling, with studies and practice in the .NET ecosystem and NoSQL databases.

devops.desc: Version control, task organization and continuous integration using Git, Azure DevOps and collaborative workflows.
